name: Tea for T
description:
In Tea for T you play as a person in a t4t (trans for trans) relationship, through different choices you can go out in nature and experience queer joy and explore the relationships and experiences of queer people in nature.

Tea for T is an interactive poetry collection that puts each poem in the context of the narrative. Certain choices will reveal poems connected to those spaces, some of which can only be met under specific circumstances.
